title: SCP Archive
source:
[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[noinclude]]
[[include fragment:fix-sidebar-themes]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module CSS]]
.archive-banner {
    background: var(--logo-image) center no-repeat,
      linear-gradient(
        180deg,
        rgba(var(--bright-accent), 0.9) 0,
        rgba(var(--dark-accent), 0.9) 100%
    );
    padding-top: 75%;
}
[[/module]]

The SCP Archive Theme is a site theme created by [[*user 7happy7]] of the JP branch. It was originally located [http://topia.wikidot.com/scp-archive here].

It was ported to EN by [[*user aismallard]], on behalf of the Technical Team.

The STAR Animation is from the [https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/component:af2017theme 2017 JP April Fool's theme]. It was created by:
* [[*user Dr Devan]]
* [[*user C-Take]]
* [[*user Nanimono Demonai]]

+ Usage

On any wiki, simply add the following to the top of the page:

[[div class="code"]]
@<[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]>@
@<[[include theme:scp-archive]]>@
[[/div]]

You can customize the header text by adding the following after the includes:

[[div class="code"]]
@<[[module CSS]]>@
@<:root {>@
@<  --header-title: "SCP Foundation";>@
@<  --header-subtitle: "Secure, Contain, Protect";>@
@<}>@
@<[[/module]]>@
[[/div]]

+ Theme Colors

[[include component:theme-squares -=-
| color1-name=Starry Night
| color1-variable=--dark-accent
| color1-info=rgb(25, 30, 30)
| color1-has-light-text=1
| color2-name=Olive
| color2-variable=--bright-accent
| color2-info=rgb(70, 90, 75)
| color2-has-light-text=1
]]

----
[[div class="archive-banner"]]
[[/div]]
----
[[/noinclude]]

[[module CSS]]
@import url("https://files.scpfoundation.net/local--files/theme:scp-archive/scp-archive-icon.css");

:root {
    --header-title: "АРХИВ SCP";
    --header-subtitle: "ОБЕЗОПАШЕНО, УДЕРЖАНО, СОХРАНЕНО";
    --header-height-on-mobile: 7.5rem;
    --header-height-on-desktop: 10rem;
    --gradient-topmenu-mobile: linear-gradient(
        180deg,
        rgba(var(--swatch-topmenu-border-color), 1) 0,
        rgba(var(--swatch-topmenu-bg-color), 1) 0.125rem,
        rgba(var(--swatch-topmenu-bg-color), 1) calc(100% - 0.125rem),
        rgba(var(--swatch-topmenu-bg-color), 1) calc(100% - 0.125rem),
        rgba(var(--swatch-topmenu-border-color),1) 100%
    );
    --link-color: 85, 135, 95;
    --visited-link-color: 65, 115, 75;
    --bright-accent: 70, 90, 75;
    --medium-accent: 30, 44, 36;
    --dark-accent: 25, 30, 30;
}

/*
STAR Animation
    * Dr Devan
    * C-Take
    * Nanimono Demonai
*/

  @-webkit-keyframes animStar {
    from {
      transform: translateY(0px);
    }
    to {
      transform: translateY(-2000px);
    }
  }
  @keyframes animStar {
    from {
      transform: translateY(0px);
    }
    to {
      transform: translateY(-2000px);
    }
  }
